verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:1
verses.text: Remember now thy Creator in the days of thy youth, while the evil days come not, nor the years draw nigh, when thou shalt say, I have no pleasure in them;

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:2
verses.text: While the sun, or the light, or the moon, or the stars, be not darkened, nor the clouds return after the rain:

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:3
verses.text: In the day when the keepers of the house shall tremble, and the strong men shall bow themselves, and the grinders cease because they are few, and those that look out of the windows be darkened,
